issue.title: [R] segfault on some CI jobs when calling `flight_put()`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16973](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16973). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
